scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --workspace api --if-present" "npm run lint --workspace @optimism-making-impact/prisma --if-present" "npm run lint --workspace @optimism-making-impact/schemas --if-present" "npm run lint --workspace web --if-present"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace api --if-present" "npm run dev --workspace @optimism-making-impact/prisma --if-present" "npm run dev --workspace @optimism-making-impact/schemas --if-present" "npm run dev --workspace web --if-present"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @optimism-making-impact/prisma && npm run build --workspace @optimism-making-impact/schemas && npm run build --workspace api && npm run build --workspace web
scripts.format: concurrently "npm run format --workspace api --if-present" "npm run format --workspace @optimism-making-impact/prisma --if-present" "npm run format --workspace @optimism-making-impact/schemas --if-present" "npm run format --workspace web --if-present"
scripts.deploy:app:staging: sst install && sst refresh --stage=staging --print-logs && sst deploy --stage=staging --print-logs
scripts.ui:build: concurrently "npm run build --workspace @optimism-making-impact/schemas --if-present" "npm run build --workspace web --if-present"
